Articles.Content:
So I've been playing Rust on and off for a couple of years, starting way back in the Legacy days. Twice I've admin'd a server, both in Legacy and the current iteration of Rust, and I'm somewhat interested in getting back into it again.

I'm wondering if there are any Rust players here on the forums that might be interested in a new server I could start up and host. Anyone out there wanna come and survive (maybe)?

I played a ton in Legacy but honestly gave up when they decided to completely dump that version and start from scratch.  They didn't even push it to a separate branch.  I should've gotten a refund when they started making those changes, as I simply do not like what the product evolved into.  Uninstalled a while ago and haven't looked back.

9 minutes ago, Slam_Jones said:

I played a ton in Legacy but honestly gave up when they decided to completely dump that version and start from scratch.  They didn't even push it to a separate branch.  I should've gotten a refund when they started making those changes, as I simply do not like what the product evolved into.  Uninstalled a while ago and haven't looked back.

Well yes, they stopped developing, but it's still possible to play Legacy.
